Do you like to find bugs in programs? You consider yourself good at it? 
 
Then this event is just for you! 
 
Event rules : 
 
-> The event consists of 2 rounds. 
 
-> In each round, the contestants will be given 5 erroneous codes written in C++ and Java. They will 
 
have to find the errors in the code. 
 
-> Maximum 2 members per team. 
 
-> In case of tie, the time of submission will be considered to decide a winner.
